text:
Hi All, writing an product roundup for a national tech & tech magazine with A-list cover stars. Better fit for hardware/gear, not so much SaaS. DM if this is a fit for your company/clients.

Looking for products to feature for readers looking to create an efficient, attractive, innovative work from home experience.
Below is a list of possible items, but we'd love to be wowed
with new technologies that don't appear here.

Please also consider that these days, more than just working
from home, many people are working with family at home. Related tech solutions for dealing with noise, bandwidth, schedule, etc. are also appreciated.

Web Cameras
Sharp monitors
Headphones
Smart backpack
Cybersecurity
Printer
3d printer
Super fast routers
Smart curtains and shades
Smart air purifiers, air quality control
Smart notebook
Fitness desk
Monitors and displays (curved, ultrawide, smart, etc.)
Media device hub Smart internet firewall
Smart lighting
Digital table (that can be used as a desk)
Unique or innovative ergonomic chairs
Working outdoors solutions
Portable power (for working in a converted shed, for example)
Requirements:

Please include a short description of what makes the product
truly innovative, or how it solves a nagging problem.

Please ensure you can provide hi res images of your suggested products.
